sentence.text: More important, negative regulation of endodermal cell differentiation haploinsufficiency markedly increased the incidence and severity of abdominal aortic aneurysms, and caused aortic tRNA splicing, via endonucleolytic cleavage and ligation ruptures and dissections, indicating that Î±2(V) chain deficits may play roles in these pathologies in humans

entity.text: negative regulation of endodermal cell differentiation
tRNA splicing, via endonucleolytic cleavage and ligation
